author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Lupin Saves the Day!
body:
Yeah, I know this week has been really f'ed up. But we need to cheer up and 
appreciate that we're still around to enjoy what life has to offer. And what 
better way to make the most of life than a Lupin game? Well anyway, details 
and pictures have surfaced of the arcade game, courtesy of 
http://www.animeondvd.com/dcforum/DCForumID13/688.html . Anyway, I hope this 
game gets released here, even if they still decide to call it Cliff Hanger.

P.S.I hope that everyone on the ML is safe, as well as their friends and 
family. (I know mine are.)
